title: Best of The Program | Guest: Nick Di Paolo | 3/11/20
description:
Coronavirus update: The outbreak is hitting Italy’s aging population hard. Medical professionals give a firsthand view of life under Italian quarantine. And New York has sent the National Guard into coronavirus-ravaged New Rochelle. Comedian Nick Di Paolo reviews Italy’s response and argues that Biden is everything the media accuses Trump of being. But is Bernie Sanders losing because of his radical ideas, or did his supporters just not show up? And Hunter Biden pathetically tried to use the coronavirus to stay out of court.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
